eye.name: eye
eye.transformationDescription:
By the time [npc.she] hesitantly [npc.verb(open)] them again, they've changed into large, owl-like eyes, which provide [npc.herHim] with excellent night vision.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldGoat(raptor-like eyes)] with [style.boldGenericTF([npc.irisShape])], [npc.irisFullDescription(true)] and [style.boldGenericTF([npc.pupilShape])], [npc.pupilFullDescription(true)].
eye.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.eyePairs] large, owl-like eyes, which provide [npc.herHim] with excellent night vision. They have [npc.irisShape], [npc.irisColour(true)] irises, [npc.pupilShape], [npc.pupilColour(true)] pupils, and [npc.scleraColour(true)] sclerae.
